In that day<S>3117</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> with his sore<S>7186</S> and great<S>1419</S> and strong<S>2389</S> sword<S>2719</S> shall punish<S>6485</S> leviathan<S>3882</S> the piercing<S>1281</S> serpent<S>5175</S>, even leviathan<S>3882</S> that crooked<S>6129</S> serpent<S>5175</S>; and he shall slay<S>2026</S> the dragon<S>8577</S> that is in the sea<S>3220</S>. <sup>piercing: or, crossing like a bar</sup>
In that day<S>3117</S> sing<S>6031</S> ye unto her, A vineyard<S>3754</S> of red wine<S>2561</S> <S>2531</S>.
I the LORD<S>3068</S> do keep<S>5341</S> it; I will water<S>8248</S> it every moment<S>7281</S>: lest any hurt<S>6485</S> it, I will keep<S>5341</S> it night<S>3915</S> and day<S>3117</S>.
Fury<S>2534</S> is not in me: who would set<S>5414</S> the briers<S>8068</S> and thorns<S>7898</S> against me in battle<S>4421</S>? I would go<S>6585</S> through them, I would burn<S>6702</S> them together<S>3162</S>. <sup>go: or, march against</sup>
Or let him take hold<S>2388</S> of my strength<S>4581</S>, that he may make<S>6213</S> peace<S>7965</S> with me; and he shall make<S>6213</S> peace<S>7965</S> with me.
He shall cause them that come<S>935</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> to take root<S>8327</S>: Israel<S>3478</S> shall blossom<S>6692</S> and bud<S>6524</S>, and fill<S>4390</S> the face<S>6440</S> of the world<S>8398</S> with fruit<S>8570</S>.
Hath he smitten<S>5221</S> him, as he smote<S>4347</S> those that smote<S>5221</S> him? or is he slain<S>2026</S> according to the slaughter<S>2027</S> of them that are slain<S>2026</S> by him? <sup>as: Heb. according to the stroke of</sup>
In measure<S>5432</S>, when it shooteth forth<S>7971</S>, thou wilt debate<S>7378</S> with it: he stayeth<S>1898</S> his rough<S>7186</S> wind<S>7307</S> in the day<S>3117</S> of the east wind<S>6921</S>. <sup>it shooteth: or, thou sendest it forth</sup> <sup>he: or, when he removeth it with</sup>
By this<S>2063</S> therefore shall the iniquity<S>5771</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> be purged<S>3722</S>; and this is all the fruit<S>6529</S> to take away<S>5493</S> his sin<S>2403</S>; when he maketh<S>7760</S> all the stones<S>68</S> of the altar<S>4196</S> as chalkstones<S>1615</S> that are beaten in sunder<S>5310</S>, the groves<S>842</S> and images<S>2553</S> shall not stand up<S>6965</S>. <sup>images: or, sun images</sup>
Yet the defenced<S>1219</S> city<S>5892</S> shall be desolate<S>910</S>, and the habitation<S>5116</S> forsaken<S>7971</S>, and left<S>5800</S> like a wilderness<S>4057</S>: there shall the calf<S>5695</S> feed<S>7462</S>, and there shall he lie down<S>7257</S>, and consume<S>3615</S> the branches<S>5585</S> thereof.
When the boughs<S>7105</S> thereof are withered<S>3001</S>, they shall be broken off<S>7665</S>: the women<S>802</S> come<S>935</S>, and set them on fire<S>215</S>: for it is a people<S>5971</S> of no understanding<S>998</S>: therefore he that made<S>6213</S> them will not have mercy<S>7355</S> on them, and he that formed<S>3335</S> them will shew them no favour<S>2603</S>.
And it shall come to pass in that day<S>3117</S>, that the LORD<S>3068</S> shall beat off<S>2251</S> from the channel<S>7641</S> of the river<S>5104</S> unto the stream<S>5158</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, and ye shall be gathered<S>3950</S> one<S>259</S> by one<S>259</S>, O ye children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
And it shall come to pass in that day<S>3117</S>, that the great<S>1419</S> trumpet<S>7782</S> shall be blown<S>8628</S>, and they shall come<S>935</S> which were ready to perish<S>6</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Assyria<S>804</S>, and the outcasts<S>5080</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, and shall worship<S>7812</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> in the holy<S>6944</S> mount<S>2022</S> at Jerusalem<S>3389</S>.
